segments.text: Wanna chill out and watch cable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! Besides The Cosby Show , I've never seen a black sitcom . What's this program ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a drama called Soul Food . This channel is BET-Black Entertainment Television . It has black shows , news and commercials .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This show is like a black Friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: BET has black shows that are overlooked by mainstream white TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's cool . I've heard LA has an all-Asian channel on cable .
segments.speaker: S2
